# 高级Bash脚本编程指南 3.9.1 (杨春敏 黄毅 译)

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/gaoji-bash-jiaoben-biancheng-zhinan-3-9-1-yangchunmin-huangyi-yi
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/gaoji-bash-jiaoben-biancheng-zhinan-3-9-1-yangchunmin-huangyi-yi
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install gaoji-bash-jiaoben-biancheng-zhinan-3-9-1-yangchunmin-huangyi-yi
gaoji-bash-jiaoben-biancheng-zhinan-3-9-1-yangchunmin-huangyi-yi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g gaoji-bash-jiaoben-biancheng-zhinan-3-9-1-yangchunmin-huangyi-yi
gaoji-bash-jiaoben-biancheng-zhinan-3-9-1-yangchunmin-huangyi-yi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
